trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Huvool Ja needs you to track down his wayward trainee.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the junkmonger.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the metal dirigible parts to the trainee mechanic.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Huvool Ja.

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_001<tab>Hey, you! You're not busy, are you? Earlier we got word that a shipment of parts has come in, so I sent my trainee to fetch them, but he's still not back yet.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_002<tab>Could I trouble you to pay a visit to the junkmonger in Bayside Bevy and ask if a young Hhetsarro has been by? I'm in the middle of something here.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_003<tab>I'd go and speak with the junkmonger myself, but my hands are full. I'll even throw in a little something to make it worth your while.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_GROCERY05018_000_010<tab>The trainee mechanic from the dirigible landing? No, I'm afraid I haven't seen him today. Might be as he took the scenic route, as he's often wont to do.

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_GROCERY05018_000_011<tab>Seeing as you're looking for him, you may as well take the delivery along with you. Knowing Huvool Ja, he won't be satisfied until both are brought to him.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_GROCERY05018_000_012<tab>As for where his young charge might be, I often see him on a pier at High Tide Harbor, gazing out at the sea. Like as not, you'll find him there now.

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_GROCERY05018_000_013<tab>You're like to find the young Hhetsarro around High Tide Harbor, taking in the ocean view. As for the delivery, tell Huvool Ja we can discuss payment later.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_020<tab>Oh! Sorry, I was lost in thought. Er...how can I help you?
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_021<tab>My mentor sent you to find me? <var 1A 02 /var>And<var 1A 01 /var> you brought the parts we ordered!? Ugh, you've well and truly caught me slacking.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_022<tab>Not to judge at a glance, but...you're not from around here, are you? Would you happen to know anything about dirigibles?
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_A1_000_001<tab>Far from it, I'm afraid.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_A1_000_002<tab>Somewhat versed, perhaps.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_A1_000_003<tab>I <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> build one, I suppose.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_023<tab>Eh, I figured. When it comes to sky travel across the salt, I've read that airships are more common by far.
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_024<tab>You at least know what they are and what they do, I take it? I understand your part of the world prefers airships, but in Tural, the dirigible is king.

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_025<tab>You've <var 1A 02 /var>built one<var 1A 01 /var>!? Dear gods, I didn't realize I was in the presence of a certified expert! Please, you simply <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> tell me all about it!
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_026<tab>I've only just started my apprenticeship, but my dream is to one day cross the sea in a balloon of my own making!
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_027<tab>Naturally, my first destination will be Old Sharlayan, where the great Koana learned so much of what he knows! Ah, what a journey it would be...

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_YOUNGHUVOOLJA_000_028<tab>Gah, there I go again! The moment my thoughts turn to daydreams, I'll find myself here at the harbor. But that's enough time wasted─I'd better take these parts back to the dirigible landing!
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_030<tab>You're back! My trainee got here just ahead of you. Now, what's this I hear about the two of you having a heart-to-heart at the harbor?
TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_031<tab>He wants to cross the sea in his own craft, eh? Good for him, I say. A boy his age ought to dream big.

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_032<tab>The technology the Second Promise brought home to Tuliyollal has sparked new ideas among the youth like nothing I've ever seen. Mark my words, they'll do great things for this country one day!

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_033<tab>Me, I've got my claws full keeping these dirigibles up and running, but the next generation has my support. Nothing would make me prouder than to watch them soar to ever greater heights.

TEXT_KINGZA002_05018_HUVOOLJA_000_034<tab>Hah! Great, now you've got <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> waxing all sentimental. Something in the fumes, perhaps. Take your reward and run along before I embarrass myself, would you?
